name: Voxelaxy
description: Using only a limited set of tools, you have to survive in a hostile environment. Crafting oxygen and finding food seems almost impossible...Are you ready?!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit,  Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit, Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb or more DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit,  Windows 8 64-bit, Windows 8.1 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit, Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb or more DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
